page.t: I will proceed to store my collected inventory items at the Headquarter.
There are no remaining dropped inventory items within my defined workspace left that we need to collect.
I will start collecting dropped inventory items in sector %2%1\033X.
Collects dropped inventory items, like AGI Processors or Carbon Filters, within a specified sector.
Collects dropped inventory items, like AGI Processors or Carbon Filters, throughout the entire galaxy.
